name: IC Anniversary Poster
description: We selected Our Anniversary Cover artist to represent IC during this year’s Miami Art Basel and in celebration, we have printed some posters which are now for sale. 100# Text High Gloss, 4/0 (Full Color One Side), 12” x 18” They are $12.00 (Including shipping & handling within the US, outside of the US, please add $3.00) Peruvian-born artist Alvaro Perez del Solar’s “Piñata” is a colorful depiction of the dark side of human experience. He has a characteristically surreal sense of humor thus creating delightfully disturbing worlds. Through childlike imagery of dismemberment and often playful representations of sexuality, his pictures express the existential absurdity of the human condition through both drama and humor. His style is unique, strikingly free and surprisingly witty, while his unforgettably vivid symbolism challenges us through its quasi-pornographic metaphors. Often wry, frequently terrifying, always remarkable, he uses vibrant colors and images of childhood and adolescence to express and put into context the pessimism that reflects the anxieties of our time, a time of great social and political upheaval. But above all, Mr. Pérez del Solar’s work possesses an irrepressible sense of fun that leaves us with the impression that in his world, there is laughter to be found in even the most unlikely of situations.

name: IC Badge/Pin Set
description:
Pins are great to pimp your laptop bag, your jacket, even your jeans. You may select singles or save by purchasing pin sets.

	They are an affordable way to say I’m thinking of you! Single badges are $1.00 and sets are only $3.50 so get yours today!
